english.segment1: You are the author of knowledge. You can redeem what's been done. You hold the present and all that's to come. Until your everlasting kingdom
english.segment2: Lord, I don't know where all this is going. Or how it all works out. Lead me to peace that is past understanding. A peace beyond all doubt
english.segment3: You are the God of tomorrow. Turning the darkness to dawn. Lifting the hopeless with hope to go on. You are the rock of all salvation
english.segment4: Lord, I don't know where all this is going. Or how it all works out. Lead me to peace that is past understanding. A peace beyond all doubt
english.segment5: Oh, Lord, you are the author. Redeeming what's been done. You hold us in the present. And all that is to come
english.segment6: Lord, we don't know where all this is going. Or how it all works out. Lead us to peace that is past understanding. A peace beyond all doubt
